|802dot11_protocols = bg |defaulip = 192.168.11.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = |defaultssid = 000D0BXXXXXX,001601XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt, Tomato |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 08/06/2005 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 747464109695 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B000AOKTJ8 |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Broadcom;BCM2050;BCM2050KMLG, TS0717 P11, 819987; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = 9 |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Multiple revisions? *"BCM5352-HP-EA" is silkscreened on the board in the TechInfoDepot pictures. *"BCM5352-HP-DA" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. This device is using an [http://www.anadigics.com/products/view/awl6153 '''Anadigics''' AWL6153 Power Amplifier Module]. ==Links of Interest== ===Wikis=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/buffalo/whr-hp-g54 On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] **Like most low-spec b/g BCM47xx gear, using '''Backfire''' (10.03.1) would be recommended *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/WHR-HP-G54 On the '''DD-WRT''' Wiki] ===Spec. sites=== *[http://bc.whirlpool.net.au/bc/hardware/?action=h_view&model_id=458 On whirlpool.net.au] :If the Whirlpool data is accurate, the default SSID is the wireless interface MAC address. WiGLE data shows the '''XX:XX:XX:XX:XX:XX''' pattern described in the Whirlpool data to be somewhat less common than '''XXXXXXXXXXXX'''. ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = v24 std (05/24/08) - build 9526 :initial flash: use [[TechInfoDepot:DD-WRT/TFTP flash|Tftp flash]] [[Buffalo WHR-HP-G54/dd-wrt|WHR-HP-G54]] ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|notrecommended}} {{OpenWrtNotice|insufficient}} {{OpenWrtNotice|endsupport|2022|19.07.10}} {{OpenWrtNotice|broadcomwifi}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/buffalo/buffalo_whr-hp-g54 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/buffalo/whr-hp-g54 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 7.09 |current_supported_version = 10.03.1 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ===Flashing Tomato=== Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
(3.3) (GND) (TxD) (RxD)
           J1

----> to Flash
